channel.title: Klipper_estimator on freakyDude's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Klipper_estimator on freakyDude's Blog

item.title: How to Get Accurate Print Time Estimates with Klipper Estimator
item.description: Learn how to dramatically improve 3D print time predictions in Klipper using the Klipper Estimator plugin. Step-by-step setup for Moonraker, Mainsail, and KlipperScreen, plus a breakdown of what makes Klipper Estimator more accurate than slicers.
